title: Fun Books to Read in 2026
summary: This article talks about 12 exciting books coming out in 2026 that you might want to read. It includes stories like Heartstopper Volume 6, which is about two boys named Nick and Charlie dealing with love and challenges as Nick goes to university. Another book is Land by Maggie O'Farrell, set in Ireland long ago, exploring family and survival. There are also books by other famous authors like Yann Martel and Ali Smith. The article suggests these books for relaxing with a good story, whether in winter on a sofa or summer in a garden. It highlights different types of books, from graphic novels to adventures in Tibet, making reading fun for everyone.
